items.sentence: Men aren\'t usually as interested in figure skating as women are.
My bicycle had a flat tire, so I missed the seven o\'clock train.
My wife usually doesn\'t drink coffee at night, and neither do I.
Tom has to learn Japanese because he\'s going to Japan next year.
Tom crosses the railroad tracks every morning on his way to work.
Tom grew a beard because he thought that all wise men had beards.
I didn\'t know why I wasn\'t supposed to go to that part of town.
I don\'t have any plans for tomorrow. I\'m going to take it easy.
Don\'t be discouraged just because you\'re not all that talented.
Tom tried to remember the last time he had visited an art museum.
